1.7.0.0.name: connect20/Morningtime_FancyZoom
1.7.0.0.description: A simple FancyZoom lightbox with gallery option. Offers handy configuration settings. Works out of the box for default themes. Uses Magento's built-in prototype.js. No jQuery required.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
